author: Ben Cohen
title: Pick These NCAA Tournament Upsets. They’re Not Really Upsets.
text:
There are lots of fields in which you’d be wise to remember that past performance does not predict future results. And then there is the NCAA tournament. The wisest thing you can do this week as you fill out your bracket is to study the past for clues about the future and behave accordingly.
Or you can listen to someone who’s already done all that tedious work for you.
John...
